donateWhen.location: 📍 Location: Any Canadian Blood Services location in Toronto
donateWhen.your: Your schedule. Your impact. One simple act that saves lives.
donateWhen.li1: Receive a digital certificate of appreciation
donateWhen.li2: Get a free ticket to our charity event in Toronto

donateTogether.title: donate together with other 20 volunteers in Toronto
donateTogether.description: We post information about group donation in our Instagram. Check our profile to be updated
donateTogether.li1: Our goal is to give a chance to 90+ people who need donated blood.
donateTogether.li2: We plan to attract 1000+ new blood donors with Ukrainian roots in Canada
donateTogether.li3: By donating blood in Canada, we will attract more investments to Ukraine.
donateTogether.igshare: Share your donation story. Inspire others.
donateTogether.igdesc1: Every drop counts - and your donation could save up to three lives. Join the
donateTogether.igdesc2: movement and stand with Canadians and Ukrainians uniting for a life-saving cause.
donateTogether.tgdesc: Stay in the loop about upcoming events, updates, and ways to get involved - all in one place.

howDonate.title: How to Donate Blood in 4 Easy Steps

1.title: Book Your Appointment
1.text1: Schedule online through out partner’s website or call

2.title: Prepare to Donate
2.text: Stay hydrated, eat a salty snack, and bring a valid photo ID.

3.title: Screen & Donate
3.text: Complete a health questionnaire, get a quick check, and donate (takes ~10 mins).

4.title: Recover & Refresh
4.text: Enjoy a snack, relax, and feel great knowing you helped save lives.

1.title: I'm nervous about donating alone. Can I still participate?
1.desc:
Absolutely! 
Many first-time donors feel nervous. You can bring a friend or join a group donation event om ... of ...

ones.title: Donate blood once - save three lives

attend.title: Attend Charity Event
attend.location: 📍 Location: Sheraton Centre Toronto Hotel, 123 Queen St W, Toronto, ON M5H 2M9
attend.text: If you want to join the event, but have not donated blood - you are welcome too! Attend Charity Event - all ticket sales and financial donations go to Ukraine.
attend.li1: One of the biggest charity Ukrainian parties in Toronto
attend.li2: Networking opportunities with Ukrainian and Canadian-Ukrainian business owners, partners and bloggers.
attend.li4: Make business connections and give away job applications

help.title: Help Ukraine
help.text1: We’re raising funds to support the Ukrainian Blood Donation Center - because every life saved begins with someone who cares. Through
help.text2: , your donation will help provide critical medical supplies, equipment, and hope to those who need it most.
help.li1: 100% of funds go to Ukrainian hospitals

partner.title: become our  partner
partner.text: Whether you're a business, organization, or passionate individual, partnering with us means unlocking new ways to grow, connect, and make a difference.

main.subTitle: We’re raising funds to support the Ukrainian Blood Donation Center - because every life saved begins with someone who cares.
main.li1: 100% of funds go to Ukrainian hospitals

4.title: Equipment
4.text: Purchased equipment for a children’s clinic in Dnipro

whereGoes.title: Where Your Donation Goes
whereGoes.text: We’ve partnered with United Together Humanitarian Relief Inc.: a trusted Canadian nonprofit helping Ukrainians affected by the war. They work directly with hospitals and local charities in Ukraine to deliver life-saving medical supplies, equipment, and aid.

1.title: They’re local and registered in Canada
1.text: United Together Humanitarian Relief Inc. is an official nonprofit based in Toronto.

2.title: They keep things transparent
2.text: You’ll see real updates on how your donation is used — including photos and impact stories.

3.title: They work directly with hospitals in Ukraine
3.text: Your money helps buy medicine, equipment, and emergency supplies where it's needed most.

seeImpact.title: See the Impact
seeImpact.li3: Updates on what your donation helped achieve

uthr.text: “This partnership means your support goes further - and reaches people who truly need it.”

money.title: Where Your Money Goes
money.text: All funds are carefully managed and tracked in partnership with our registered nonprofit partner, United Together Humanitarian Relief Inc. If you'd like to see reports or have questions about where your donation goes, just reach out - we’re here to share.

1.title: Blood Donation Campaigns in Canada
1.li1: Promotion and coordination of donation drives with Canadian Blood Services
1.li2: Creation of educational materials and targeted digital outreach
1.li3: Logistics and volunteer coordination to run safe, high-impact events

2.title: Event Venue, Catering & Hospitality
2.li1: Renting welcoming and accessible event spaces
2.li2: Providing catering, drinks, and hospitality for guests and donors
2.li3: Covering event logistics and staff support to ensure a high-quality experience

3.title: Community Engagement & Awareness
3.li1: Organizing charity events that unite Ukrainian and Canadian communities
3.li2: Producing media content and storytelling that inspires action
3.li3: Developing partnerships with businesses and nonprofits to expand impact
